Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 17 STRIKE UAVS KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On September 14, 2024, t...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk⚡️ 17 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 14, 2024, the Russian occupiers attacked with 2 armored aircraft with new Kh-59/69 missiles from the expanse of the Belgorod region - Russian Federation . and 23 attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type from the areas of Chauda - Krim, Yeysk, Kursk - Russian Federation. In anti-aircraft combat with mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, aviation, anti-aircraft missile units and the REB 17 enemy UAVs were shot down near Mykolayivska by the shaking forces, Cherkassy, ​​Kirovograd, Kiev, Zaporizhzhya, Sumy, Kharkiv and Zhytomyr regions. For the combat work!🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖🦅 Commander of the Military Forces, Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
